SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.levels

Class LevelSemi

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.levels.LevelParent
com.example.demo.levels.LevelSemi
public class LevelSemi extends LevelParent
The LevelSemi class represents the semi-final level of the game. It extends the LevelParent class and provides specific configurations and behaviors for this level.

    • checkIfGameOver

      protected boolean checkIfGameOver()
      Checks if the game is over by evaluating the player's health and wave progress. If the player is destroyed, the game is lost. If all waves are cleared, the next level is loaded.
      Specified by:
      checkIfGameOver in class LevelParent
      Returns:

    • initializeFriendlyUnits

      protected void initializeFriendlyUnits()
      Initializes the friendly units for this level by adding the player's character to the scene.
      Specified by:
      initializeFriendlyUnits in class LevelParent

    • spawnEnemyUnits

      protected void spawnEnemyUnits()
      Spawns enemy units for this level based on the spawn probability and the total number of enemies. New enemies are added to the scene until the total number of enemies is reached.
      Specified by:
      spawnEnemyUnits in class LevelParent

    • startNextWave

      protected void startNextWave()
      Starts the next wave by resetting the wave progress and updating the wave counter. If all waves are cleared, the game over condition is checked.

    • instantiateLevelView

      protected LevelView instantiateLevelView()
      Instantiates the LevelView for this level, which manages the UI elements specific to this level.
      Specified by:
      instantiateLevelView in class LevelParent
      Returns:
      a new LevelView instance for this level
